attributes.action: I would like there to be more jobs for teenagers aged between 14-15
attributes.additional_details: I would like them to do it as these teens are not doing nothing these days and they cant do anything because of these laws
attributes.background: I would like the rules of jobs for teens to change as there is nothing they can do these days and not all parents can provide them money for things they need/want

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure how you'd like the law to change.  You can see the current restrictions here

https://www.gov.uk/child-employment/restrictions-on-child-employment

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
